languages.text: "Леди Вьятт уже начала подготовку к ритуалу". {n}Вайс указывает на темно-бурые надписи на незнакомом языке.{/n} "Я чувствую чуждую силу в этих письменах... Потустороннюю и нечестивую мощь... И молюсь Императору, что вам ведомо, что вы делаете".

"Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."
languages.original_text: "Леди Вьятт уже начала подготовку к ритуалу". {n}Вайс указывает на темно-бурые надписи на незнакомом языке.{/n} "Я чувствую чуждую силу в этих письменах... Потустороннюю и нечестивую мощь... И молюсь Императору, что вам ведомо, что вы делаете".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark-brown inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

"Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark-brown inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

"Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark-brown inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

"Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

languages.text: «Lady Vyatt ya ha comenzado con los preparativos del ritual». {n}Weisz señala las inscripciones de color rojo oscuro e idioma desconocido.{/n} «Siento un poder extraño y distante en estos glifos... Una fuerza sobrenatural e impía... Rezo al Emperador por que sepa lo que está haciendo».
languages.original_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Vyatt ya ha comenzado con los preparativos del ritual». {n}Weisz señala las inscripciones de color rojo oscuro e idioma desconocido.{/n} «Siento un poder extraño y distante en estos glifos... Una fuerza sobrenatural e impía... Rezo al Emperador por que sepa lo que está haciendo».

languages.text: 「レディ・ビャットは、すでに儀式の準備を始めている」{n}ワイズは、見慣れない言語で書かれた暗赤色の碑文を指差す。{/n}「この魔術文字から遠い妙な力を感じる…異世界の邪悪な力…あなたが何をしようとしてるか分かっていることを、皇帝に祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ビャットは、すでに儀式の準備を始めている」{n}ワイズは、見慣れない言語で書かれた暗赤色の碑文を指差す。{/n}「この魔術文字から遠い妙な力を感じる…異世界の邪悪な力…あなたが何をしようとしてるか分かっていることを、皇帝に祈ろう」

languages.text: “维亚特女士已经准备好举行仪式了。”{n}威茨指着暗红色的符文，这种符文是用某种你不熟悉的语言写成的。{/n}“我在这些文字里感到了某种遥远而古怪的力量……来自另一个世界的邪恶力量……我向帝皇祈祷，希望您明白您在做些什么。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

traits.locale_text: “维亚特女士已经准备好举行仪式了。”{n}威茨指着暗红色的符文，这种符文是用某种你不熟悉的语言写成的。{/n}“我在这些文字里感到了某种遥远而古怪的力量……来自另一个世界的邪恶力量……我向帝皇祈祷，希望您明白您在做些什么。”

languages.text: "Lady Vyatt bereitet sich bereits auf das Ritual vor." {n}Weisz deutet auf die dunkelroten Inschriften in einer dir unbekannten Sprache.{/n} "Ich spüre eine merkwürdige und ferne Macht in diesen Glyphen ... Eine andersweltliche, unheilige Kraft ... Und ich bete zum Imperator, dass Ihr wisst, was Ihr tut."
languages.original_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Vyatt bereitet sich bereits auf das Ritual vor." {n}Weisz deutet auf die dunkelroten Inschriften in einer dir unbekannten Sprache.{/n} "Ich spüre eine merkwürdige und ferne Macht in diesen Glyphen ... Eine andersweltliche, unheilige Kraft ... Und ich bete zum Imperator, dass Ihr wisst, was Ihr tut."

languages.text: « Dame Vyatt a déjà commencé à se préparer pour le rituel, {n}répond Weisz en désignant les inscriptions rouge sombre rédigées dans une langue inconnue.{/n} Je détecte un pouvoir étrange et lointain, dans ces glyphes... Une puissance surnaturelle et impie... Je prie l'Empereur pour que vous sachiez ce que vous faites. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Vyatt a déjà commencé à se préparer pour le rituel, {n}répond Weisz en désignant les inscriptions rouge sombre rédigées dans une langue inconnue.{/n} Je détecte un pouvoir étrange et lointain, dans ces glyphes... Une puissance surnaturelle et impie... Je prie l'Empereur pour que vous sachiez ce que vous faites. »

languages.text: "Leydi Vyatt, hâlihazırda ayin hazırlıklarına başladı." {n}Weisz; aşina olmadığın bir dilde yazılmış, koyu kızıl talimatları işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bu gliflerde uzaklardan gelen, garip bir güç seziyorum. Bu dünyanın ötesinden gelen, uğursuz bir kudret... Ne yaptığınızı bilmeniz için de İmparator'a dua ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lady Vyatt has already begun to prepare for the ritual." {n}Weisz points to the dark red inscriptions in an unfamiliar language.{/n} "I sense a strange and distant power in these glyphs... An otherworldly, unholy might... And I pray to the Emperor that you know what you are doing."
